entry.title: Yet Another Junior Developer Guide
entry.summary: So you just landed your first job and discovered you gotta work on some dreaded legacy module. “I know nothing, why am I here?” Classic impostor syndrome. Spoiler alert: you’re very likely wrong, you got there for a reason. Everybody started somewhere, the difference is how quick you get to be productive. Ask for an easy task, dive into the code base. The sooner you start, the sooner you ...
